text: Aimaq Hazara is a group of Aimaq people of Hazara origin. They live in Afghanistan and they are Sunni Muslims. == Related pages == * Ethnic groups in Afghanistan * Hazara people * Aimaq people == References == *A Sociological Study Of The Hazara Tribe In Baluchistan (An Analysis Of Socio-Cultural Change) Category:Hazara people Category:Ethnic groups in Afghanistan
title: Aimaq Hazara
